document.full_text: in a big win for business, the treasury proposed on friday to exempt commonly used foreign exchange swaps and forwards from the most onerous new rules for the derivatives market.
document.title: u.s. plans to exempt forex swaps from new rules
lines_and_colors: in a big win for business, the treasury proposed on friday to exempt commonly used foreign exchange swaps and forwards from the most onerous new rules for the derivatives market.
